projects.name: O(fast)
projects.subtitle: A brand new educational platform for competitive programming. Features interactive lessons on data structures and algorithms, and a code submission system.
projects.description: O(fast) offers a problem submission system and interactive lessons to help students learn and practice data structures algorithms. We also created a contribution system that allows members of the community to create their own lessons and problems for the site.

projects.name: Elysium7 Trade
projects.subtitle: An e-commerce website where users can buy and sell gaming gear.

projects.name: Socket Poker
projects.subtitle: An online multiplayer texas-holdem poker game. Real-time connectivity implemented using the SocketIO library.

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.subtitle: A display of my work experience and software projects with a personal touch.
